code: import userActionType from"./user.type";export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user){return{type:userActionType.SET_CURRENT_USER,payload:user};};export var googleSignInStart=function googleSignInStart(){return{type:userActionType.GOOGLE_SIGN_IN_START};};export var signInSuccess=function signInSuccess(user){return{type:userActionType.SIGN_IN_SUCCESS,payload:user};};export var signInFailure=function signInFailure(errorMessage){return{type:userActionType.SIGN_IN_FAILURE,payload:errorMessage};};export var emailSignInStart=function emailSignInStart(email,password){return{type:userActionType.EMAIL_SIGN_IN_START,payload:{email:email,password:password}};};export var userSignoutStart=function userSignoutStart(){return{type:userActionType.USER_SIGN_OUT_START};};export var userSignoutSuccess=function userSignoutSuccess(){return{type:userActionType.USER_SIGN_OUT_SUCCESS};};export var userSignoutFailure=function userSignoutFailure(error){return{type:userActionType.USER_SIGN_OUT_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var signUpStart=function signUpStart(email,password,displayName){return{type:userActionType.SIGN_UP_START,payload:{email:email,password:password,displayName:displayName}};};export var checkSession=function checkSession(){return{type:userActionType.CHECK_SEESION};};export var setSession=function setSession(user){return{type:userActionType.SET_SEESION,payload:user};};
